title: Intermittent 504s on payments API
description: Merchants report intermittent 504 Gateway Timeout errors when calling /v1/payments for EU customers. Incidents spike during peak traffic windows.

title: Webhook delivery delays
description: Webhook deliveries for order.created events are delayed by up to 10 minutes. Affected region appears to be US-West.

title: Login failures after password reset
description: A subset of users cannot log in after resetting their password. They see 'invalid session' errors on /auth/login.

title: High error rate for refunds API
description: Refunds API /v1/refunds returns 400 for valid refund requests when amount is above 10,000.

title: Spike in 429 rate limiting
description: Mobile apps are hitting 429 Too Many Requests on /v1/profile for Android users only.
